name: get_3_month_historical_daily_prices
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stock_prices.
Tool description: Returns the adjusted open, high, low, and close price for a given symbol.  Volume, dividend, and stock split information is also included for each symbol.
API description: 3 Month historically adjusted Open, High, Low, and Close prices.  Daily Volume, Dividend, and Split information is also included.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol to fetch historical prices for.
